content:
No, I haven't had any major repairs or issues with my car so far, just the usual routine maintenance like oil changes and tire rotations. And yeah, I should ask my brother to take a look at the air filter, belts, and hoses. He's always been good about keeping an eye on those things.

And actually, I was thinking about getting a car inspection soon, just to make sure everything is in good shape. I've been putting it off, but it's probably a good idea to get it done before winter sets in. Do you think I should get a full inspection or just a basic one?
